title: It's Game Night! What are You, your Main, and your Main's Friends playing?
body:
(Head Canonical Friends Apply, Need not be Video Games)

https://pp.vk.me/c625726/v625726916/2a8/NmkfSoss9po.jpg

-----------

{{champion:37}}: 

Gotta have a DDR Night, show off them moves...

http://www.technobuffalo.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/07/ddr-600x450.jpg

Hecarim cheats... and Veigar is having a tough time... MF is Shaking it and Sona is listenin' to the beats. Riven is off getting snacks and Blitz is chatting it up with the Playstation.
-------

replies.body: Legend of Zelda Majora's mask. {{champion:131}} seems to enjoy the incoming moonfall. Meanwhile {{champion:89}} is horrified.

And Leona has to watch it over... and over... and OVER

Bwahahahaha... uh yah... sounds fun

We all know what game Leona is playing

http://i.imgur.com/xZ2sEbd.gif

{{champion:16}} my main 
her friends {{champion:201}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:37}} 
its a support game night!!!
they try many different board games but they are all too nice to try and win so they settle for 
https://images.funagain.com/cover/huge/19463.jpg

its a game where they get to apologize and as supports their used to that....

fizz is probably playing dota 2 and try to get good at slark 

http://t11.deviantart.net/MCTl5pwCenIDOUgAYxQm8nmPq0E=/fit-in/150x150/filters:no_upscale():origin()/pre07/bb73/th/pre/f/2013/189/f/d/_dota2_x_lol__slark_and_fizz_by_zeitzbach-d6cl9nk.png

Me: Tring not to get killed by {{champion:31}}
{{champion:161}} {{champion:121}} and {{champion:31}} are all playing Evolve, {{champion:96}} in winning even thought heehaw no idea what he is doing
thats adorable, hilarious and a bit creep...so many emotions....
Poor amumu main {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}
{{champion:56}}  never plays, at night he likes to get in your dream
Must play pokemon, He must run a Dream Eater pokemon in his Team
nocturne, Darkrai, umbreon, sableye, hypno, Yveltal

{{champion:119}} and {{champion:122}} 
Dunking demacian scums 
http://img.ifcdn.com/images/2b898371180c1848031263d306f7c3460319ac1e67c7ee39091be75089a70ee7_1.gif
Playing COD black Draaaven works too
https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=eElt4C9G0u4

{{champion:82}} as my main {as if it isn't easy to tell} would always invite the other juggernauts over to his place to play games

---

{{champion:122}} So what have you got for us today, Morde?

{{champion:82}} Ark: Survival Evolved. It's a game with dinosaurs. I got us our own server to screw around on.

{{champion:86}} What in Laughing Fish is a dinosaur anyways? I thought that was just a skin for Gnar.

{{champion:72}} You wouldn't know, but dinosaurs were a thing on Runeterra, long before humans or even yordles were a thing, for the most part they went extinct, very few dinosaurs still existed when ancient humans and yordles like Gnar first emerged, and for good reason: you fleshbags would have likely not gotten to where you are now if they were still around.

{{champion:420}} (huffs) Nagakabouros tells me that dinosaurs were constantly in motion: it was always eat or be eaten. How I wish to have lived in such times.

{{champion:2}} (daydreams about living and dying in such times, wonders if he could kidnap Ekko and use his time-travel device... then sighs as he realizes sadly he only recently learned how to use modern electronics and the prospect would likely just end in disaster)

{{champion:83}} (rolls his eyes) Anyways, how bad could dinosaurs be?

{{champion:82}} They have great honkin bears like Voli in the game, and they are still considered miniscule compared to some of the dinos there were.

{{champion:106}} Oh come on, you make these things sounds like Cho'Gath with how big they can get!

{{champion:82}} (starts the game on one of the many gaming pc's he has, spawns a t-rex with console commands that proceeds to eat his character like an omelet)

{{champion:75}} ...that is a big lizard. (shudders at the thought of Renekton ever getting that big)

{{champion:77}} (starts to practice his Dinosaur Stance in case he ever gets a rework)

{{champion:102}} Well they can't be better than a dragon. (huffs defensively)

{{champion:82}} Shyvana, these things supposedly covered the entirety of Runeterra. Hundreds of thousands of Cho'gath-sized lizards running around, and who knows how many of them were magical?

{{champion:36}} (starts to play the game) Ah, Mundo's character has no items or clothes! Mundo only has boxers!

{{champion:82}} It's called Ark: **Survival** Evolved. The whole point is you start with nothing and...

{{champion:48}} Hahahahaha! (copied what Morde did, and has suddenly started spawning hundreds of T-rexes)

{{champion:82}} ...work your way up. (sighs, and wonders why he still lets Trundle come to these gatherings)
http://66.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m28tvazYrf1rqq1iao1_500.gif

I assume Bard brought his world famous...

"Brownies"?
You know it

{{champion:143}} 
we play plants vs zombies

OVERWATCH

I figured he'd be playing Depth

{{champion:421}} 
https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/9/95/Dig_Dug_Flyer.png
{{champion:75}} and I just chilled playing Farming Simulator.
{{champion:61}} and.... oh wait nevermind. Erm, Beer ball? She always wins, as Ball doesn't have a mouth.

Me, {{champion:14}}, and {{champion:6}} go bowling on our game nights. 

Sion's way better than I am, and urgot isn't bad neither, even though he does have some issues. overall it's a pretty good time.
{{champion:39}} Doesn't really like to play games, she usually just wears her blue jumpsuit and twerks.
